alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued August 14 at 7:08PM PDT until August 17 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 8 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 114. * WHERE...Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 8 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
